Career information: Selected by the San Francisco Warriors

Career highlights and awards: NBA champion (1975) | NBA Finals MVP (1975) | ABA champion (1969) | 8× NBA All-Star (1966, 1967, 1973-1978) | NBA All-Star Game MVP (1967) | 5x All-NBA First Team (1966, 1967, 1974-1976) | All-NBA Second Team (1973) | 4× ABA All-Star (1969-1972) | 4× All-ABA First Team (1969-1972) | NBA Rookie of the Year (1966) | NBA All-Rookie First Team (1966) | NBA scoring champion (1967) | NBA steals leader (1975) | NBA anniversary team (50th, 75th) | No. 24 retired by Golden State Warriors | Consensus first-team All-American (1965) | NCAA season scoring leader (1965) | No. 24 retired by Miami Hurricanes
